name: Tag added to Case
description: Triggers when a specific tag is added to a case
comment: Whether we use tags or custom fields, all tags (or custom fields) are included in the payload at each update. As a result, any later update operation on tags or custom fields will trigger undesired notifications. For example: If we want to alert when a case is soon out-of-sla with 'out-of-sla' tag, then any later added tag will trigger the notification again.
